mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (category_id, category_name, publisher_id, title, content, position) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{categoryName}, #{publisherId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{position})
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET image_path = #{imagePath} WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.select: SELECT article_id, category_id, category_name, publisher_id, title, content, image_path, position, article.create_time, user.user_name AS publisherName, user.user_tel AS publisherTel, user.user_avatar AS publisherAvatar FROM article LEFT JOIN user ON article.publisher_id = user.user_id WHERE publisher_id = #{publisherId} ORDER BY article_id DESC

SELECT article_id, category_id, category_name, publisher_id, title, content, image_path, position, article.create_time, user.user_name AS publisherName, user.user_tel AS publisherTel, user.user_avatar AS publisherAvatar FROM article LEFT JOIN user ON article.publisher_id = user.user_id WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY article_id DESC

SELECT article_id, category_id, category_name, publisher_id, title, content, image_path, position, article.create_time, user.user_name AS publisherName, user.user_tel AS publisherTel, user.user_avatar AS publisherAvatar FROM article LEFT JOIN user ON article.publisher_id = user.user_id ORDER BY article_id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
